snippet.title: Funko Fusion - Official Story Trailer
snippet.description:
Get ready Freddy… Eddy LIVES!

Birthed from the bowels of the Funko Wonder Works Factory, Eddy is evil incarnate. With the power of Freddy’s Crown, Eddy will travel to every world you love, warping it into his own distorted image.

Gather your friends and play with over 60 characters from some of your favourite franchises to take the fight to Eddy!

Coming to PS5, Xbox Series X|S, and Steam on 9/13
Coming to PS4 on 11/15, Nintendo Switch in December.

====
JOIN THE FUNKO FUSION DISCORD:
https://discord.gg/QxAkeptF
====
Follow us on social for updates:
X - https://x.com/funkofusiongame
Instagram - https://instagram.com/funkofusiongame
Facebook - https://facebook.com/funkofusiongame
Threads - https://threads.net/@funkofusiongame
TikTok - https://tiktok.com/@funkofusiongame
Visit https://funkofusion.com for more information
